Package Game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game.Game
public class Game extends Object
The main class representing the game.
Author:
Tânia Morais, Tomás Neto

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Mission mission)
      Constructs a Game object with a given mission.
      Parameters:
      mission - The mission containing information about the map, divisions, and objectives.

    • Game

      public Game(Player player, String filename)
      Constructs a Game object with a player and a mission file.
      Parameters:
      player - The `Player` object representing the player.
      filename - The filename containing the mission data.

  • Method Details

    • selectEntrancesExits

      public Division selectEntrancesExits()
      Allows the player to select an entrance or exit division. Displays a list of entrance/exit divisions on the console and allows the player to select one.
      Returns:
      The selected Division object representing the chosen entrance or exit.
      Throws:
      LeaveGameException - If the player chooses to exit the game.

    • selectNewDivision

      public Division selectNewDivision(Division oldDivision)
      Allows the player to select a new division adjacent to the current one. Displays adjacent divisions and enables manual traversal to another division.
      Parameters:
      oldDivision - The current division the player is located in.
      Returns:
      The newly selected `Division` object.
      Throws:
      LeaveGameException - If the player chooses to exit the game.

    • displayImportantInfo

      public void displayImportantInfo()
      Displays essential player information, including health and power stats.

    • playerInsideBuilding

      public boolean playerInsideBuilding()
      Checks if the player is inside a building and interacts accordingly. Offers an option to leave the building and updates the player's status.
      Returns:
      true if the player is still inside the building, otherwise false.

    • showMap

      public void showMap()
      Displays the current game map to the console.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Returns the Player object representing the current player in the game.
      Returns:
      The Player instance.

    • getMap

      public Map<Division> getMap()
      Returns the Map object representing the game map.
      Returns:
      The Map containing divisions and related game locations.

    • getMission

      public Mission getMission()
      Returns the current mission object containing objectives and divisions.
      Returns:
      The Mission instance containing map and mission details.

    • wasMissionSuccessfull

      public boolean wasMissionSuccessfull()
      Checks if the mission was successfully completed. The mission is successful if the player is not in the building and the target division is secured.
      Returns:
      true if the mission objectives have been met, otherwise false.

    • reloadData

      public void reloadData()
      Reloads the game map and mission data. Updates the map to reflect the current mission state and divisions.

    • showShortestPathToTarget

      public void showShortestPathToTarget(Division startDivision)
      Displays the shortest path to the target division on the console. Provides a visual representation of the traversal path through the divisions to the target.
      Parameters:
      startDivision - The starting division from which the path to the target is calculated.

    • showShortestPathToExit

      public void showShortestPathToExit(Division currentDivision, Division startDivision)
      Displays the shortest path back to the entrance division on the console. Provides a visual representation of the traversal path back to the game's starting point.
      Parameters:
      currentDivision - The division currently traversed by the player.
      startDivision - The starting division where the game began.
